category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Search_Results_Recency_WeightAge
preference.preference_description: Defines the priority attribute for date in listing search results in the Active Workspace client. Value should be an integer between 0 and 6. The value 0 will turn off the date boost and the value 6 will maximize the date boost. Date boost is a boost given by solr to documents based off the age of the document. The higher the value for this preference will result in a more recent document being boosted higher than an older doucment. The lower the value the less older documents are pentalized in the boost. Default value is set to 1.
